items.name: func undoManager(for: WebView!) -> UndoManager!
items.desc: Returns the undo manager to be used by a web view.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, doCommandBy: Selector!) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the receiver performs a command instead of the web view.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldApplyStyle: DOMCSSStyleDeclaration!, toElementsIn: DOMRange!) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the user should be allowed to apply a style to a range of content.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldBeginEditingIn: DOMRange!) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the user is allowed to edit a range of content in a web view.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldChangeSelectedDOMRange: DOMRange!, to: DOMRange!, affinity: NSSelectionAffinity, stillSelecting: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the user should be allowed to change the selected range.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldChangeTypingStyle: DOMCSSStyleDeclaration!, toStyle: DOMCSSStyleDeclaration!) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the user should be allowed to change the typing style in a web view.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldDelete: DOMRange!) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the user should be allowed to delete a range of content.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldEndEditingIn: DOMRange!) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the user should be allowed to end editing.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldInsert: DOMNode!, replacing: DOMRange!, given: WebViewInsertAction) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the user should be allowed to insert a node in place of a range of content.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, shouldInsertText: String!, replacing: DOMRange!, given: WebViewInsertAction) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether a user should be allowed to insert text in place of a range of content.

items.name: func webViewDidBeginEditing(Notification!)
items.desc: Sent by the default notification center when the user begins editing the web view.

items.name: func webViewDidChange(Notification!)
items.desc: Sent by the default notification center when the user changes content in the web view.

items.name: func webViewDidChangeSelection(Notification!)
items.desc: Sent by the default notification center when the user changes the selection in the web view.

items.name: func webViewDidChangeTypingStyle(Notification!)
items.desc: Sent by the default notification center when the user changes the typing style in the web view.

items.name: func webViewDidEndEditing(Notification!)
items.desc: Sent by the default notification center when the user stops editing the web view.
